markdown:
<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[The Spellscar Desert](/Articles.aspx?ID=61)</title>

**Source** [Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz](/Sources.aspx?ID=122) pg. 66

The wild and weird wasteland east of Alkenstar defies description. Keep an eye out for threats both familiar and alien as you explore the Spellscar Desert!
name: The Spellscar Desert
